award.first_step_desc: For obtaining the first bookmaker account
award.analyst_desc: For adding the first 100 bets to the system
award.expert_desc: For adding the first 1000 bets to the system
award.king_of_night_desc: For a series of bets on events starting after midnight
award.long_term_player_desc: At least 1 bet per month for 6 months
award.safe_player_desc: For a series of 10 bets with odds below 1.5
award.pro_desc: For a positive ROI at the end of the month with at least 100 bets in the month
award.sport_guru_desc: Award for betting on 5 different sports within a month
award.wide_reach_desc: For connecting 3 accounts from different bookmakers
award.hero_return_desc: For 5 winning bets after 5 consecutive losses
award.intuition_desc: For winning a bet with odds over 20
award.odds_magnate_desc: For a series of 10 bets with odds below 1.5
award.secret_desc: For a series of 10 bets with odds below 1.5

faq.create_acc_section_1: Before you start using all the features of our extension, we strongly recommend reading the detailed installation instructions. It contains all the necessary steps and recommendations tailored specifically for your browser to make the installation process as simple and convenient as possible.
faq.create_acc_section_2: Thus, cats play an important role in human life. They not only bring joy and comfort to the home but also become part of culture and art. Their presence helps us cope with everyday stress and fills our world with warmth and love.
faq.ext_download_section_1: Welcome to the world of convenience and possibilities with our new browser extension! Now you can place bets even easier and faster by simply installing our extension. Visit the 'Extension' page to learn how our tool can enhance your betting experience.
faq.ext_download_section_2: To use it, first download the extension archive from our site and then extract it. Since our extension is compatible with various browsers, we have prepared separate articles with installation instructions for each. Choose the article from the list below corresponding to your browser!
faq.ext_google_tittle: How to Install the Extension in Google Chrome
faq.ext_google: To use the extension in Google Chrome, read this brief installation guide!
faq.ext_iamge_goole_1: In the browser, go to the section, Settings: More Tools: Extensions
